The code is \n*2767*3855#\nImportant: Performing a factory data reset erases all data — like your apps, photos, and music from your device Every mobile phone, GSM modem or device with a built-in phone / modem has a unique 15 digit IMEI number. Based on this number, you can check some information about the device, eg brand or model. A locked mobile phone is one that has been restricted by software so that it can only be used with a single network or carrier. Locked mobile phones are usually GSM phones that use a SIM card - hence the use of the term SIM lock. The reason for the lock is because mobile phones are usually heavily subsidized and carriers want to discourage people switching networks or shipping phones to other countries.

System Dump is the dump of everything on the system folder of your phone. It includes apps, wallpapers, ringtones and many more unknown files. Detailed Camera information of your android smartphone. A factory reset, also known as master reset, is a software restore of an electronic device to its original system state by erasing all of the information stored on the device in an attempt to restore the device software to its original manufacturer settings.
